meanings.definition: Deal or trade in something illegal
meanings.sent1: The criminals trafficked drugs across the border.
meanings.sent2: She was caught trafficking stolen goods.
meanings.sent3: The pirates trafficked in counterfeit treasure maps.
meanings.sent4: The black market trafficked in forbidden artifacts.
meanings.sent5: The underground network trafficked in contraband items.

meanings.definition: Send or transport goods or people illegally
meanings.sent1: The smugglers trafficked weapons through hidden tunnels.
meanings.sent2: They were arrested for trafficking endangered animals.
meanings.sent3: The secret agent trafficked top-secret documents in a briefcase.
meanings.sent4: The illegal operation trafficked people across the border.
meanings.sent5: The criminals trafficked contraband goods in unmarked trucks.

meanings.definition: Engage in illegal activities for profit
meanings.sent1: The gangsters trafficked in counterfeit money.
meanings.sent2: He was accused of trafficking in stolen identities.
meanings.sent3: The con artists trafficked in fake antiques.
meanings.sent4: The corrupt officials trafficked in bribes for personal gain.
meanings.sent5: The criminals trafficked in illegal substances for money.
